amendment.description: To provide $100,000 for initiation of feasibility studies to address erosion along the Bayou Teche, Louisiana within the Chitimacha Reservation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1701 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1701 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11540) To provide $100,000 for initiation of feasibility studies to address erosion along the Bayou Teche, Louisiana within the Chitimacha Reservation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1701 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1701 proposed by Senator Reid.
